sqlMap.statement: SELECT A.BJOBMSGSCHEID AS "BJOBMSGSCHEID" , A.BJOBMSGSCHEID AS "BJOBMSGSCHEID" , A.OSIDINSTIDSTCD AS "OSIDINSTIDSTCD" , A.BJOBMSGDSTCD AS "BJOBMSGDSTCD" , A.SENDRECVYN AS "SENDRECVYN" , LTRIM(RTRIM(A.SNDRCVCYCLTYPNAME)) AS "SNDRCVCYCLTYPNAME" , LTRIM(RTRIM(A.SNDRCVSTARTHMS)) AS "SNDRCVSTARTHMS" , LTRIM(RTRIM(A.SNDRCVENDHMS)) AS "SNDRCVENDHMS" , A.EAIWARNYN AS "WARNYN" , A.THISMSGUSEYN AS "THISMSGUSEYN" , A.THISMSGREGSNTID AS "THISMSGREGSNTID" , A.THISMSGREGIHMS AS "THISMSGREGIHMS" , A.THISMSGAMNDRID AS "THISMSGAMNDRID" , A.THISMSGAMNDHMS AS "THISMSGAMNDHMS" , B.BJOBBZWKDSTCD AS "BJOBBZWKDSTCD" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIBS05 A , $schemaId$.TSEAIBJ01 B WHERE A.BJOBMSGDSTCD = B.BJOBMSGDSTCD AND LTRIM(RTRIM(BJOBMSGSCHEID)) = #bjobMsgScheID#
